definition: flour/noodles/(of food) soft (not crunchy)/(slang) (of a person) ineffectual/spineless
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc

sentences.english: He is an impartial and incorruptible judge.
sentences.chinese: 他是一名铁面无私的法官。

sentences.english: He is a impartial and incorruptible judge.
sentences.chinese: 他是一名铁面无私的法官。

sentences.english: He's an impartial and perspicacious judge.
sentences.chinese: 他是一名铁面无私的法官。

sentences.english: He is a impartial and incorruptible law-officer. judge.
sentences.chinese: 他是一名铁面无私的法官。

definition: to maintain the law as firm as a mountain (idiom); to enforce the law strictly
to hate evil as one hates an enemy (idiom)
not to submit to force (idiom); to defy threats and violence
iron mask (as defensive armor)/fig. upright and selfless person
to bend the law in order to favor one's relatives or associates (idiom)
to love the common people as one's own children (praise for a virtuous ruler)
conducting business impartially (idiom); to act justly
to place righteousness before family (idiom); ready to punish one's own family if justice demands it
self-restraint and devotion to public duties (idiom); selfless dedication/to serve the public interest wholeheartedly
